limitSizeExceeded: File size exceeds the limit. Maximum allowed size is 5 MB per file.
notApplicableDesc: Some questions are scope-specific and don't apply to every assessment. You can mark them as not applicable, then they will be excluded from reports and won't affect your scores.
moreDetails: You may provide additional details about your report (optional).
optionsNotMatch: The options do not match the question
questionsEmptyState: No questions with the selected issues.
questionIsUnclear: The question is unclear or confusing
questionIsIncorrect: The question is technically or factually incorrect
questionHaveMultipleAnswers: The question is ambiguous / may have multiple correct answers
questionPhraseBetter: The question could be better phrased (please provide your suggestion)
quickAnswerDesc: If enabled, you will be taken to the next question after submitting. Otherwise, you will stay on this page.
reportSentSuccessfully: The report has been sent successfully.
whatIssuesLikeToReport: Please specify any issues related to this question:
unsupportedFileFormat: Allowed file types: PDF, JPG, PNG, DOCX, PPTX, RAR, ZIP, Excel files.
